properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Chosen vessels Empty weak and small Bearing heaven's Greatest treasure Christ the Lord of all Christ the Lord of all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"Set apart" A chosen vessel To the King of kings "Set apart" Forever severed From all earthly things{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"Set apart" To bear the fragrance Of His blessed Name And with Him To share the sufferings Of a cross of shame{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"Set apart" With Him to suffer O'er a world undone And to stand In fiercest conflict Till the fight be won{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"Set apart" An earthern vessel Empty weak and small Yet the treasure That it beareth Christ the Lord of all{/lang-eng}
